pageContext.claim: “'Donald Trump’s Approval Rating is at or near his highest level ever. The media is not being honest about what is happening in this Country.' Jesse Watters”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweets a statement by supporter that is not borne out by polling data. Trump's approval rating was at its peak six days after the start of his presidency -- 47.8 percent -- and it had never gone above that level, according to the blended poll rating maintained by FiveThirtyEight. By his 15th day as president, Trump's disapproval rating exceeded his approval rating and it has never recovered. At the time of this tweet, Trump's approval rating was 41.8 percent, and his disapproval rating was 53.4 percent.
